static calc_end_to_end_dist(atom_group)[source]
static calc_free_volume(universe, plot=None, bins=25, from_multiple=False)[source]
static calc_free_volume_multiple(universe_list, graph_title=None, plot=True, bins=25)[source]

This function takes a list of universes, calls the calc_free_volume function for each, and plots the results on the same graph.

Parameters:

  • universe_list – List of universes

  • plot – Boolean to indicate if you want to plot or just return the values

  • bins – Number of bins for data binning

Returns:

A list of (temperatures, volumes) for each universe

Bases: object

static mdanalysis_info_2_xyz(atom_types, coordinates, filepath)[source]

Converts atom types and coordinates into an XYZ file format and saves it.

Parameters:

  • atom_types (list of str) – List of atom type strings (e.g., ‘h’, ‘c’, ‘o’).

  • coordinates (list of lists) – List of coordinates, where each coordinate is [x, y, z].

  • filepath (str) – Path to save the XYZ file.
